data.eml:eml: First records of Gnathia Leach, 1814 and Tachaea Schioedte & Meinert, 1879 from South Korea, with descriptions of two new species (Isopoda, Cymothoida, Cymothooidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Song, Ji-Hun, Min, Gi-Sik (2018): First records of Gnathia Leach, 1814 and Tachaea Schioedte & Meinert, 1879 from South Korea, with descriptions of two new species (Isopoda, Cymothoida, Cymothooidea). ZooKeys 787: 17-35, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.787.26291, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.787.26291
